verbs.description: The claim [V: was] made by Darrell Scott , a pastor and outside adviser to the White House , who met with Trump for 20 minutes after a White House ceremony for the National Day of Prayer .

[ARG1: The claim] was [V: made] [ARG0: by Darrell Scott , a pastor and outside adviser to the White House , who met with Trump for 20 minutes after a White House ceremony for the National Day of Prayer] .

The claim was made by [ARG0: Darrell Scott , a pastor and outside adviser to the White House] , [R-ARG0: who] [V: met] [ARG1: with Trump] [ARGM-TMP: for 20 minutes] [ARGM-TMP: after a White House ceremony for the National Day of Prayer] .
